Package sait.mms.managers

Class MovieManagementSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.mms.managers.MovieManagementSystem
  • public class MovieManagementSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class description: Manages a list of movies.
    Author:
    Joe Blow (123456)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.Scanner keyboard
      Used to get input from the keyboard.
      private java.util.ArrayList<Movie> movies
      Hold list of movies in memory.
      static java.lang.String TEXT_FILE
      Location of text file (relative to the project folder).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMovie​(int duration, java.lang.String title, int year)
      Adds a movie to the array list.
      void displayMenu()
      Display main menu to user.
      void generateMoviesInYear​(int year)
      Generates and displays all movies from a year as well as the total duration.
      void generateRandomMovies​(int count)
      Generates and displays a list of random movies as well as the total duration.
      void loadMovies()
      Load movies from text file into array list.
      void writeMoviesToFile()
      Save movies from objects in memory to hard drive.

        Adds a movie to the array list.
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration of movie
        title - Movie title
        year - Year movie was released

      • generateMoviesInYear

        public void generateMoviesInYear​(int year)
        Generates and displays all movies from a year as well as the total duration.

        Generates and displays a list of random movies as well as the total duration.

      • loadMovies

        public void loadMovies()
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Load movies from text file into array list.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the text file does not exist.

      • writeMoviesToFile

        public void writeMoviesToFile()
        Save movies from objects in memory to hard drive.
